State and Private Forestry, Forest Service

description.narrative: The implementation of the World Trade Organization Agreement on the Application of Sanitary and Phytosanitary Measures in 1995 established the central role of pest risk analysis (PRA) as the primary basis for phytosanitary decision-making. The US and all WTO member countries invest considerable resources and effort in establishing appropriate PRA systems, including the training of scientific staff and the development of methodologies. APHIS-PPQ has established itself as a clear leader in PRA, with one of the largest and most advanced risk analysis groups in the world - the Plant Epidemiology and Risk Analysis Laboratory (PERAL) with PPQ's Center for Plant Health Science and Technology (CPHST) in Raleigh, North Carolina provides training in Plant Risk Analysis, International participants attend this training to learn best practices for conducting their own PRAs and meeting international standards for science-based risk analysis.

person-name.narrative: Daniel Herche and Tyson Whitney; Ryan Boles

sector.narrative: Plant and post-harvest protection and pest control

transaction.usg:treasury-account: Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service, Salaries and Expenses

description.narrative: APHIS/New Delhi participated in a multi-agency SPS Assessment of Bangladesh. This week long event was a critical component of the Presidents Feed the Future Initiative. The recent establishment of reform initiatives in the Bangladesh Ministry of Agriculture offers a unique opportunity for cooperation between APHIS and key Departments with sanitary and phytosanitary (SPS) responsibilities and international obligations. Government of Bangladesh (GoB) officials have stated their interest in developing a cooperative program with APHIS for the express purpose of sharing knowledge, developing the capacity of technical professionals to perform SPS related activities, as well as gaining a full understanding of what is necessary to update Bangladeshs surveillance/monitoring, laboratory and testing infrastructure. Feed the Future is a unique opportunity to capitalize on the established relationship between APHIS and offices in the Department of Agriculture responsible for SPS enforcement and applications. Therefore, the initial objective was to strengthen this relationship by working

person-name.narrative: Daniel Herche and Tyson Whitney; Ryan Boles

title.narrative: Field Study-Bangladesh: Mothers Infants and Lactation Quality(MILQ) Project

description.narrative: EARLY-MILQ (E-MILQ) STUDY TO COLLECT AND ANALYZE HUMAN MILK DURING THE FIRST MONTH POSTPARTUM - THE ONGOING MILQ STUDY HAS SUCCESSFULLY COLLECTED COLOSTRUM (AT 2-3 DAYS POSTPARTUM) AND THEN BREAST MILK FROM 1 MONTH THROUGH 8.5 MONTHS POSTPARTUM. MILK SAMPLES WERE NOT COLLECTED DURING THE FIRST MONTH BECAUSE OF INVESTIGATOR'S CONCERN THAT ADDING MILK COLLECTION (ACCOMPANIED BY A GREAT DEAL OF ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ON MOTHERS AND INFANTS AS COLLECTED AT ALL VISITS) DURING THE FIRST FEW WEEKS AFTER BIRTH WOULD RESULT IN UNACCEPTABLE RATES OF REFUSAL TO ENROLL AND EARLY DROP-OUTS DURING THIS STRESSFUL PERIOD. HOWEVER, SAMPLE COLLECTION FROM 1 TO 8.5 MONTHS HAS PROCEEDED EXCEPTIONALLY WELL WITH FEWER DROP-OUTS THAN EXPECTED AT ALL FOUR SITES. AT THIS TIME THE INVESTIGATORS BELIEVE THAT WE COULD ADD A FOLLOW-ON, SEPARATE STUDY OF MILK COMPOSITION AND VOLUME BETWEEN BIRTH AND 1 MONTH POSTPARTUM, AND THAT THIS WOULD BE WELL-ACCEPTED BY PARTICIPANTS. HAVING THIS INFORMATION ON MILK COMPOSITION AND VOLUME DURING THE FIRST MONTH WILL ENABLE US TO: AuxFunctions AuxScripts AwsFunctions ConnectionClasses Constants Dockerfile ExitFunctions Gemfile Gemfile.lock ShellScripts donor_app.rb iati_app.rb input_files output_files COMPLETE THE OTHERWISE CONTINUOUS COMPOSITION CURVES FROM 1 TO 8.5 MONTHS WITH DATA FROM BIRTH THROUGH 1 MONTH. AuxFunctions AuxScripts AwsFunctions ConnectionClasses Constants Dockerfile ExitFunctions Gemfile Gemfile.lock ShellScripts donor_app.rb iati_app.rb input_files output_files MEASURE THE AVERAGE 14-DAY MILK VOLUME FOR EACH PARTICIPANT ON A ROLLING BASIS BETWEEN 2 TO 3 DAYS POSTPARTUM AND 31 DAYS POSTPARTUM. AuxFunctions AuxScripts AwsFunctions ConnectionClasses Constants Dockerfile ExitFunctions Gemfile Gemfile.lock ShellScripts donor_app.rb iati_app.rb input_files output_files DETERMINE YOUNG INFANTS' NUTRIENT INTAKES FROM MILK. AuxFunctions AuxScripts AwsFunctions ConnectionClasses Constants Dockerfile ExitFunctions Gemfile Gemfile.lock ShellScripts donor_app.rb iati_app.rb input_files output_files DETECT STRONGER ASSOCIATIONS BETWEEN MATERNAL STATUS AND MILK CONCENTRATIONS. AuxFunctions AuxScripts AwsFunctions ConnectionClasses Constants Dockerfile ExitFunctions Gemfile Gemfile.lock ShellScripts donor_app.rb iati_app.rb input_files output_files OBTAIN REFERENCE VALUES FOR NUTRIENTS, AND DATA ON METABOLITES, HMOS AND BIOACTIVE PROTEINS IN EARLY MILK.

description.narrative: The McGovern-Dole program provides for the donation of agricultural commodities and the provision of financial and technical assistance to improve the education, food security and health of school-age children, especially girls, in developing countries.

description.narrative: The Scientific Cooperation Research Program supports joint research, extension, and education projects lasting up to two years among domestic and international agricultural professionals. These projects address issues including agricultural trade and market access, animal and plant health, biotechnology, food safety and security, and sustainable natural resource management.

person-name.narrative: Daniel Herche and Tyson Whitney; Ryan Boles
